participant_1.name: Alex Morgan
participant_1.personality: Curious and open-minded, always eager to learn about others.
participant_1.background: Alex works in social media marketing and enjoys connecting with people from different backgrounds.

participant_2.personality: Inquisitive and thoughtful, often pondering the motivations behind people's choices.

content.text: I am not sure what you do for a living?
